about.name: About us

team_1.title: Join the team
team_1.desc: Our expertise in digital marketing allows us to make decisions quickly and demonstrate significant results. We have open positions. Apply on our website with your contact details to learn more.

team_2.title: Join the team
team_2.name: Opportunity
team_2.desc: A candidate's appearance, age, location, or views don't matter to us. What's important is talent, a strong work ethic, a desire to grow, and the ability to always stay connected.

team_3.title: Join the team
team_3.name: Growth and Training
team_3.desc: A lack of knowledge or experience in a particular field is not an obstacle, but an incentive to master a new area. We provide training based on real case studies and help you develop your skills.

team_4.title: Join the team
team_4.name: Great Compensation
team_4.desc: We will cover the cost of any tools, services, and neural networks for a comfortable workflow, provide an above-market salary, and offer numerous bonus opportunities. We respect your work, which is why we even pay for test assignments.

frame_1.name: Why Choose Us
frame_1.desc: Oyster Computer works with both large companies and startups.

frame_2.name: Comprehensive Approach
frame_2.desc: From strategy and branding to ad launches and analytics, we cover the full digital marketing cycle. You don't need to search for different contractors; everything is under one roof.

frame_3.name: Transparency and Control
frame_3.desc: You always know where the budget is going and what results each channel delivers. We provide clear reports and performance metrics.

frame_4.name: Tailored Solutions
frame_4.desc: Every project is unique. We don't use template-based approaches; instead, we develop a strategy that works specifically for your business.

feedback.title: Fill out the form and we will contact you within 15 minutes
feedback.desc: Fill out the short form, leave your phone number or Telegram username, and a personal assistant will contact you within 15 minutes
